job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Software Engineer - GPU Compute: Full-time/ Part-time/ Contract-to-Hire</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Strong knowledge of C++ and experience in large code bases</li><li>Strong knowledge of CUDA as applied to recent GPU microarchitectures (e.g., Volta, Turing)</li><li>BS in computer science or related field</li><li>Strong knowledge of 3D geometry and linear algebra</li><li>Experiencing debugging and optimizing GPU kernels using tools like nvprof and the Visual Profiler</li><li>Comfortable in Linux development environments</li></ul>
